home.callToAction: Ready to build your dream home? Get a free consultation today!

introduction.description: We are a construction company dedicated to building high-quality, durable, and beautifully designed homes. With strong values and a passion for craftsmanship, we bring a unique touch to every project—combining tradition, innovation, and attention to detail.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.description: Founded by a team of skilled builders and designers, Prime Builders was created to provide families with high-quality homes they can truly be proud of. Our bilingual team, fluent in both English and Spanish, ensures a smooth, clear, and stress-free building process, making your vision a reality with expert craftsmanship and care.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to build more than just houses—we create homes that stand the test of time. Our mission is to provide top-quality construction services while staying true to our values of excellence, community, and trust.

latinoHeritage.title: Latino Heritage & Craftsmanship
latinoHeritage.description: We bring cultural pride and precision to every project.

customerCentered.title: Customer-Centered Approach
customerCentered.description: Your vision matters. We work closely with clients to turn dreams into reality.

qualityEfficiency.title: Quality & Efficiency
qualityEfficiency.description: We use top-tier materials and proven construction methods to ensure lasting homes.

affordablePricing.title: Affordable & Transparent Pricing
affordablePricing.description: No hidden fees, just honest and fair pricing for every project.

member1.name: John Doe
member1.description: With over 15 years in the construction industry, John started Prime Builders to bring high-quality craftsmanship to local communities. His expertise in home building, remodeling, and project management ensures that every house is built to perfection.

member2.name: Maria López
member2.description: Maria keeps every project running smoothly, ensuring timelines and budgets stay on track. With a background in architecture and years of experience in the construction field, she bridges the gap between design and execution.

member3.name: Javier Torres
member3.description: Javier specializes in designing functional, beautiful homes tailored to each family's unique needs. His creative vision, paired with technical precision, helps turn ideas into stunning reality.

member4.name: Diego Hernández
member4.description: Diego is a master of his craft, bringing intricate details and high-quality finishes to every home. His dedication to excellence can be seen in every structure, from framing to final touches.

member5.name: Jane Doe
member5.description: Jane brings warmth and style to every project, ensuring homes are not only well-built but also beautifully designed. Her keen eye for detail and passion for interior aesthetics complete the dream home experience.

introduction.description: At Prime Builders, we believe a home is more than just walls and a roof-it's where life's best moments happen. We take pride in building more than just houses-we create homes where families can grow, celebrate, and make lasting memories. From concept to completion, our team is dedicated to delivering excellence, ensuring every detail is crafted with precision and care.

customHome.title: Custom Home Construction
customHome.description: We build homes tailored to your needs, style, and budget. From foundation to finishing touches, we create spaces where families can grow and thrive.

renovation.title: Home Renovations & Remodeling
renovation.description: Transform your existing space with expert remodeling services. Whether it's a modern kitchen, a luxurious bathroom, or a full-home renovation, we make your dream upgrades a reality.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Living Spaces
outdoor.description: From patios and decks to outdoor kitchens, we create beautiful outdoor areas that bring comfort and style to your backyard.

recentWork.title: Recent Work
recentWork.description: Browse through our recent projects below to see how we've transformed spaces and created structures that stand the test of time. Whether you're planning a small renovation or a large-scale construction project, our portfolio demonstrates our capability to deliver exceptional results.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.introduction: We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.subject: Subject
form.name: Name
form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll be in touch soon.

errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please try again in {{timeRemaining}} seconds.
errors.submitFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
